<Link id="l00525" /><CodeLine lineNumber="525"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00526" /><CodeLine lineNumber="526"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   If the VMap argument is non-null, a mapping will be added between F and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00527" /><CodeLine lineNumber="527"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// the new declaration, and between each of F&#39;s arguments and the new</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00528" /><CodeLine lineNumber="528"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// declaration&#39;s arguments. This map can then be passed in to moveFunction to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00529" /><CodeLine lineNumber="529"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// move the function body if required. Note: When moving functions between</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00530" /><CodeLine lineNumber="530"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// modules with these utilities, all decls should be cloned (and added to a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00531" /><CodeLine lineNumber="531"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// single VMap) before any bodies are moved. This will ensure that references</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00532" /><CodeLine lineNumber="532"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// between functions all refer to the versions in the new module.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00533" /><CodeLine lineNumber="533"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/orc/#a993ad5e82f2d59de8127cfcb38a62e0a">cloneFunctionDecl</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a> &amp;Dst, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00534" /><CodeLine lineNumber="534"><span class="doxyHighlight">                            <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abf0f52ae29f87b5e0f2b95ff961cdae1">ValueToValueMapTy</a> &#42;VMap = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00535" /><CodeLine lineNumber="535"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00536" /><CodeLine lineNumber="536"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Clone a global variable declaration into a new module.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00537" /><CodeLine lineNumber="537"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalvariable">GlobalVariable</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/orc/#a88db5656a6723001ab395e9db68094c2">cloneGlobalVariableDecl</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a> &amp;Dst, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalvariable">GlobalVariable</a> &amp;GV,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00538" /><CodeLine lineNumber="538"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abf0f52ae29f87b5e0f2b95ff961cdae1">ValueToValueMapTy</a> &#42;VMap = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00539" /><CodeLine lineNumber="539"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00540" /><CodeLine lineNumber="540"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Clone a global alias declaration into a new module.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00541" /><CodeLine lineNumber="541"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalalias">GlobalAlias</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/orc/#aaa5acf165c5a3bec2ff360c59f2f9448">cloneGlobalAliasDecl</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a> &amp;Dst, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalalias">GlobalAlias</a> &amp;OrigA,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00542" /><CodeLine lineNumber="542"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abf0f52ae29f87b5e0f2b95ff961cdae1">ValueToValueMapTy</a> &amp;VMap);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00543" /><CodeLine lineNumber="543"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00544" /><CodeLine lineNumber="544"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Introduce relocations to \\p Sym in its own definition if there are any</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00545" /><CodeLine lineNumber="545"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// pointers formed via PC-relative address that do not already have a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00546" /><CodeLine lineNumber="546"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// relocation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00547" /><CodeLine lineNumber="547"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00548" /><CodeLine lineNumber="548"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This is useful when introducing indirection via a stub function at link time</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00549" /><CodeLine lineNumber="549"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// without compiler support. If a function pointer is formed without a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00550" /><CodeLine lineNumber="550"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// relocation, e.g. in the definition of \\c foo</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00551" /><CodeLine lineNumber="551"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00552" /><CodeLine lineNumber="552"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\code</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00553" /><CodeLine lineNumber="553"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// &#95;foo:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00554" /><CodeLine lineNumber="554"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   leaq -7(%rip), rax # form pointer to &#95;foo without relocation</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00555" /><CodeLine lineNumber="555"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// &#95;bar:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00556" /><CodeLine lineNumber="556"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   leaq (%rip), %rax  # uses X86&#95;64&#95;RELOC&#95;SIGNED to &#39;&#95;foo&#39;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00557" /><CodeLine lineNumber="557"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\endcode</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00558" /><CodeLine lineNumber="558"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00559" /><CodeLine lineNumber="559"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// the pointer to \\c &#95;foo computed by \\c &#95;foo and \\c &#95;bar may differ if we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00560" /><CodeLine lineNumber="560"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// introduce a stub for &#95;foo. If the pointer is used as a key, this may be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00561" /><CodeLine lineNumber="561"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// observable to the program. This pass will attempt to introduce the missing</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00562" /><CodeLine lineNumber="562"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// &quot;self-relocation&quot; on the leaq instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00563" /><CodeLine lineNumber="563"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00564" /><CodeLine lineNumber="564"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This is based on disassembly and should be considered &quot;best effort&quot;. It may</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00565" /><CodeLine lineNumber="565"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// silently fail to add relocations.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00566" /><CodeLine lineNumber="566"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/orc/#a86c56f594b268ffb1f273fc4bc0f140b">addFunctionPointerRelocationsToCurrentSymbol</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/jitlink/symbol">jitlink::Symbol</a> &amp;Sym,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00567" /><CodeLine lineNumber="567"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                                   <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/jitlink/linkgraph">jitlink::LinkGraph</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ad96b7cf3182ce2ba85e5a7a93b12c441">G</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00568" /><CodeLine lineNumber="568"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                                   <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcdisassembler">MCDisassembler</a> &amp;Disassembler,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00569" /><CodeLine lineNumber="569"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                                   <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinstranalysis">MCInstrAnalysis</a> &amp;MIA);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00570" /><CodeLine lineNumber="570"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00571" /><CodeLine lineNumber="571"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// end namespace orc</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00572" /><CodeLine lineNumber="572"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00573" /><CodeLine lineNumber="573"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// end namespace llvm</span></CodeLine>
